00022 void LogicalListView::dropEvent( QDropEvent* event ) {
00023         // make sure the source is not this view
00024         PortListView* source = qobject_cast<PortListView*>(event->source());
00025         PortMapsView* mapSource = qobject_cast<PortMapsView*>(event->source());
00026 
00027         // if source is neither of the supported
00028         if (!source && !mapSource) {
00029                 return;
00030         }
00031 
00032         if (mapSource && event->proposedAction() == Qt::CopyAction) {
00033                 event->acceptProposedAction();
00034                 return;
00035         }
00036 
00037         QModelIndex index = indexAt(event->pos());
00038 
00039         // tell source that nothing is to be done to item
00040         event->setDropAction(Qt::IgnoreAction);
00041 
00042         // if no port name has been specified or drop index is invalid
00043         QString mimeText = event->mimeData()->text();
00044         if (mimeText.isEmpty()) {
00045                 event->accept();
00046                 return;
00047         }
00048 
00049         // get the ports that were selected
00050         QStringList dropped = mimeText.split(QString(";"), QString::SkipEmptyParts);
00051 
00052         // if the item to drop is from this port list view
00053         if (source == this) {
00054                 emit moveItems(dropped, index);
00055                 event->accept();
00056                 return;
00057         }
00058 
00059         // get the selected indexes in this view
00060         QModelIndexList indexes = selectedIndexes();
00061         QStringList logicals;
00062 
00063         // add the physical port that matches each selected index
00064         foreach (QModelIndex index, indexes) {
00065                 if (index.isValid()) {
00066                         // append each port with valid model index
00067                         logicals.append(index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString());
00068                 }
00069         }
00070 
00071         // inform that connection should be made
00072         emit makeConnection(dropped, logicals);
00073 
00074         // accept the drop
00075         event->accept();
00076 }
